attributes.action: STOP ANIMAL TESTING! Use rapists, muderes! If the pay is enough humans will!
attributes.additional_details: I WILL NOT GIVE UP. I would like to contact to speak to someone in person. A lot of cosmetic companies test on animals, they wash them in chemicals that burn their skins out things in their eyes that burn or blind them. It is brutal and if it's outside of a lab people go to jail for a long time for these acts of inhumane acts!!
attributes.background: I WILL NOT REST Animals are being tortured everyday of their poor life's then returned into a cage waiting for them to re live it again. IMAGINE if you where in their positions would you need/want help? The pain the thoughts going through their mind. Helpless poor animals, breaks my heart.
